community_listings.title: Rhizome Community: Cloudflare Protected
community_listings.description: The Rhizome community page (rhizome.org/community/) features digital art and new media culture listings including exhibitions, opportunities, events, and jobs. Automated scraping is currently blocked by Cloudflare JavaScript challenge protection.

community_listings.title: About Rhizome Community Listings
community_listings.description: Typical listings include: Open calls for artists, Exhibitions and screenings, Residencies and fellowships, Teaching positions, Curatorial opportunities, Technical roles in arts organizations, and Community events in digital art and new media.

note: To fetch real data: This workflow needs Playwright with Chromium browser. In GitHub Actions, add these steps before running fetch_rhizome.py: (1) pip install playwright, (2) playwright install chromium --with-deps. This installs ~300MB of dependencies.
alternative: Manual updates can be made by visiting https://rhizome.org/community/ and extracting listings into this JSON structure.
